about_the_game:
In the streets of the city, ancient and future interweave a stunning spectacle. Oriental Pearl Tower, as
A sun rises in the heart of this city, spreading its light in all directions. High-rise buildings and simple costumes,
It is as if a time tunnel has taken us back to the past and plunged into the future. It is a meeting point of time and space, one full
Exotic place.


DLSS (Deep Learning Super Sampling) technology
plays a key role.
In this DLC you will experience the cyberpunk big city and many more cool tools and transportation systems.
detailed_description:
In the streets of the city, ancient and future interweave a stunning spectacle. Oriental Pearl Tower, as
A sun rises in the heart of this city, spreading its light in all directions. High-rise buildings and simple costumes,
It is as if a time tunnel has taken us back to the past and plunged into the future. It is a meeting point of time and space, one full
Exotic place.


DLSS (Deep Learning Super Sampling) technology
plays a key role.
In this DLC you will experience the cyberpunk big city and many more cool tools and transportation systems.

name: CyberModu

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K (4 * 3300) AMD Phenom II X4 965 (4 * 3400) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 (2048 MB) / Radeon RX 550 (4096 MB)
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60FPS, Low settings, 720p)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K (4 * 4000) or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X (4 * 3500) or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1660 or AMD RX6500XT
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60fps 1080 High Settings

short_description: In that distant future, the city of Shanghai is no longer the Shanghai we know. It has become CyberWorl-2049, a dream city, full of mystery and hope.A city of dreams, a dream of the future, an adventure of yours.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English*
*languages with full audio support
